name: worldboss-api
description: A source for people who want to invest in our planet and a sustainable future.

scripts.update: npx knex --knexfile config/knexfile.js migrate:rollback && npx knex --knexfile config/knexfile.js migrate:latest && npx knex --knexfile config/knexfile.js seed:run
scripts.migrate:prod: heroku run knex --knexfile config/knexfile.js migrate:latest -a quizard-backend
scripts.rollback:prod: heroku run knex --knexfile config/knexfile.js migrate:rollback -a quizard-backend
scripts.seed:prod: heroku run knex --knexfile config/knexfile.js seed:run -a quizard-backend
